content: More of this, please. I’ve known the story of Image for years, but it’s always nice to hear it from another perspective. It’s especially interesting to see how perspectives change as the creators mature from the young hotshots to older veterans. Often times, these articles focus on what sells (because Marvel or DC pushes it hard), regardless of the quality. But these kind of articles add depth to the comics landscape, especially for people who may only know the very basics. I know we’re going to get a lot of Patriots, NBA and Trump articles on this site…that’s just how it is. But keep throwing these kinds articles out there and I’ll keep reading them.
